mapper.select: SELECT P.POST_TITLE, P.POST_CONTENT, P.POST_LIKE_COUNT, P.POST_COMMENT_COUNT, '무료' AS CATEGORY_B_NAME, M.MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_POST P JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_ID = M.ID JOIN TBL_CATEGORY_C CC ON P.CATEGORY_C_ID = CC.ID JOIN TBL_CATEGORY_B CB ON CC.CATEGORY_B_ID = CB.ID AND CB.CATEGORY_B_NAME = '무료' JOIN TBL_CATEGORY_A CA ON CB.CATEGORY_A_ID = CA.ID ORDER BY P.POST_DATE DESC

SELECT P.POST_TITLE, P.POST_CONTENT, P.POST_LIKE_COUNT, P.POST_COMMENT_COUNT, '유료' AS CATEGORY_B_NAME, M.MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_POST P JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_ID = M.ID JOIN TBL_CATEGORY_C CC ON P.CATEGORY_C_ID = CC.ID JOIN TBL_CATEGORY_B CB ON CC.CATEGORY_B_ID = CB.ID AND CB.CATEGORY_B_NAME = '유료' JOIN TBL_CATEGORY_A CA ON CB.CATEGORY_A_ID = CA.ID ORDER BY P.POST_DATE DESC
